titleStmt.title: The princely pellican. Royall resolves presented in sundry choice observations, extracted from His Majesties divine meditations: with satisfactory reasons to the whole kingdome, that his sacred person was the onely author of them.

notesStmt.note: The dedication is in two versions, beginning (1) "To the rising hope .." or (2) "To all faithfull ..".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
